actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to add a requirement that the comprehensive State plan include provisions for the prevention of crime against the elderly.

summary.text: Revises the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act to require that comprehensive State plans include provisions for the prevention of crimes against the elderly.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to add a requirement that the comprehensive State plan include provisions for the prevention of crime against the elderly.
